description:
8.114 surround
Apply audio surround upmix filter.

This filter allows to produce multichannel output from audio stream.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: surround

options.description:
Set output channel layout. By default, this is 5.1.

See (ffmpeg-utils)the Channel Layout section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the required syntax.
options.name: chl_out

options.description:
Set input channel layout. By default, this is stereo.

See (ffmpeg-utils)the Channel Layout section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the required syntax.
options.name: chl_in

options.description: Set input volume level. By default, this is 1.
options.name: level_in

options.description: Set output volume level. By default, this is 1.
options.name: level_out

options.description: Enable LFE channel output if output channel layout has it. By default, this is enabled.
options.name: lfe

options.description: Set LFE low cut off frequency. By default, this is 128 Hz.
options.name: lfe_low

options.description: Set LFE high cut off frequency. By default, this is 256 Hz.
options.name: lfe_high

options.description: Set LFE mode, can be add or sub. Default is add. In add mode, LFE channel is created from input audio and added to output. In sub mode, LFE channel is created from input audio and added to output but also all non-LFE output channels are subtracted with output LFE channel.
options.name: lfe_mode

options.description: Set temporal smoothness strength, used to gradually change factors when transforming stereo sound in time. Allowed range is from 0.0 to 1.0. Useful to improve output quality with focus option values greater than 0.0. Default is 0.0. Only values inside this range and without edges are effective.
options.name: smooth

options.description: Set angle of stereo surround transform, Allowed range is from 0 to 360. Default is 90.
options.name: angle

options.description: Set focus of stereo surround transform, Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default is 0.
options.name: focus

options.description: Set front center input volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: fc_in

options.description: Set front center output volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: fc_out

options.description: Set front left input volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: fl_in

options.description: Set front left output volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: fl_out

options.description: Set front right input volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: fr_in

options.description: Set front right output volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: fr_out

options.description: Set side left input volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: sl_in

options.description: Set side left output volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: sl_out

options.description: Set side right input volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: sr_in

options.description: Set side right output volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: sr_out

options.description: Set back left input volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: bl_in

options.description: Set back left output volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: bl_out

options.description: Set back right input volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: br_in

options.description: Set back right output volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: br_out

options.description: Set back center input volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: bc_in

options.description: Set back center output volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: bc_out

options.description: Set LFE input volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: lfe_in

options.description: Set LFE output volume. By default, this is 1.
options.name: lfe_out

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for all channels. Allowed range is from -1 to 15. By default this value is negative -1, and thus unused.
options.name: allx

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for all channels. Allowed range is from -1 to 15. By default this value is negative -1, and thus unused.
options.name: ally

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: fcx

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: flx

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: frx

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: blx

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: brx

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: slx

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: srx

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: bcx

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: fcy

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: fly

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: fry

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: bly

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: bry

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: sly

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: sry

options.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
options.name: bcy

options.description: Set window size. Allowed range is from 1024 to 65536. Default size is 4096.
options.name: win_size

options.description:
Set window function.

It accepts the following values:

‘rect’
‘bartlett’
‘hann, hanning’
‘hamming’
‘blackman’
‘welch’
‘flattop’
‘bharris’
‘bnuttall’
‘bhann’
‘sine’
‘nuttall’
‘lanczos’
‘gauss’
‘tukey’
‘dolph’
‘cauchy’
‘parzen’
‘poisson’
‘bohman’
‘kaiser’

Default is hann.
options.name: win_func

options.description: Set window overlap. If set to 1, the recommended overlap for selected window function will be picked. Default is 0.5.
options.name: overlap
